name: Textless Adventure
description:
This is a text adventure where you must extinguish a fire raging on your Mars base, all without using any text!

Instead, you control your character by drawing symbols, allowing you to open doors, pick up objects and eventual put out a fire.

(This is a solo game jam project, so the recognizer used is quick and dirty, my apologies if you have work at getting it to recognize some symbols. I have included a walkthrough to help a bit with the contrivances of the systems )
